name: @invintusmedia/tomp4
description: Convert MPEG-TS and fMP4 streams to standard MP4 - pure JavaScript, zero dependencies

scripts.release: npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "Build v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run release

author: Invintus Media
